DOC.brief_summary: This study patient advance testicular cancer . This research study involve treatment oxaliplatin , paclitaxel , gemcitabine , investigational chemotherapy combination . This study patient respond standard cisplatin-containing chemotherapy cancer return treatment . This research do assess effectiveness propose combination medication type cancer .
DOC.brief_title: Study Gemcitabine , Oxaliplatin , Paclitaxel Patients With Refractory Germ Cell Carcinoma
DOC.criteria: 1 . Prior histologic serologic confirmation testicular extragonadal germ cell neoplasm amenable surgical cure 2 . Must refractory germ cell neoplasm define one following : patient progress within 4 week cisplatincontaining tx , OR patient fail initial salvage chemotx regimen , include highdose tx ( chemotx stem cell support ) , POMBACE tx , VeIP , VIP 3 . Must one following ( check apply ) : unidimensionally measurable doze assess within 14 day prior registration , elevate Î²HCG > 20 mIU assess within 2448 hour prior registration , OR AFP > 2 x uln assess within 57 day prior registration Note : Soft tissue dz , radiate 2 month prior registration , assessable measurable dz . 4 . Xrays , scan , PE nonmeasurable dz must complete within 14 day registration 5 . May receive prior surgery RT . At least 3 week must elapse since completion previous tx must recover adverse effect 6 . Zubrod PS less equal 2 7 . Greater equal 16 year age 8 . AGC great equal 1.5 ; platelet great equal 100,000 9 . Total bilirubin < 2.5 x uln ; SGOT alk phos < 5 x uln ( obtain within 14 day prior registration ) 10 . LDH ( obtain within 7 day prior registration ) 11 . Creatinine < 2.5 x uln calc meas CrCl great equal 40 ml/min ( obtain within 14 day prior registration ; patient must renal dialysis ) 12 . Serum K+ Mg++ within inst range normal ( obtain within 14 day prior registration ) 13 . Men reproductive potential must agree use effective contraceptive method 14 . Signed informed consent ( include HIPAA authorization ) 1 . Prior tx cytotoxic experimental agent within 14 day prior registration 2 . Evidence concurrent infection ( T > 96.8F < 101.5F ; WBC < 11.0 unless value ascribe another tumorrelated phenomenon ) 3 . Other prior malignancy , except adequately treat basal cell squamous cell skin cancer , adequately treated stage I II cancer patient currently chemoradiation ( CR ) , cancer patient diseasefree 5 year
